moves.1. e4: Second part of my series pawn rollers
moves.1... c5 2. Bc4: Not my favourite move against the Sicilian
moves.3... Nc6 4. Nf3 g6 5. d4 cxd4 6. Nxd4 Bg: I like the bishop on g7 in the Sicilian
moves.7. Nxc6: Not suggested but the only alternatives were Be3, Nf3 or c3
moves.8. c3: Blocks the bishop but takes away the knight's natural square
moves.8... d5 9. Qa4 Bd7 10. Nd2 Nf6 11. Bd3 O: Black has completed his development and stands better
moves.12... Qc7 13. b3 Rab8: I don't know what I was trying to achieve here
moves.14. Nf3: ? Drops a piece. I prefer O-O
moves.14... dxe4 15. Ng1 exd3 16. Qxd3 Nd5: Now my knight has a nice hole.
moves.18. O-O Bc8: Stopping Qa6 which is a nuance
moves.19. Bd2 Rd8 20. Qg3: looking to trade queens however black has a better option
moves.22... Bxa1 23. Rxa1 Ne3: threatening mate however not as string as I thought. fxe3 qxe3+ Kh1 nothing happens
moves.53. b6 g5: Prepares f4 winning if the pawns can be stopped
Black stops the threat and with f4 he will win.

Pawns 1 - 1 Pieces

gameName: Pawn Rollers pt2: N and B v 3 pawns
